name: erp-mock-servers
description: Servidores mock para diferentes sistemas ERP para testes do middleware

scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:sap" "npm run start:oracle" "npm run start:dynamics" "npm run start:legacy"
scripts.test: echo "Testando conectividade dos ERPs mock..." && npm run test:health
scripts.test:health: node -e "require('http').get('http://localhost:3001/health', (res) => { console.log('SAP:', res.statusCode); }); require('http').get('http://localhost:3002/health', (res) => { console.log('Oracle:', res.statusCode); }); require('http').get('http://localhost:3003/health', (res) => { console.log('Dynamics:', res.statusCode); }); require('http').get('http://localhost:3004/health', (res) => { console.log('Legacy:', res.statusCode); }); })"

author: API Middleware Team
